ygData.subject: Re: Spell damage
ygData.msgSnippet: Quick answer. Yes. Have experimented with it, damage is max d about 50% more often with tashan d mob. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Quick answer. Yes.

Have experimented with it, damage is max'd about 50%
more often with tashan'd mob.

--- Scott.Mcgougan@... wrote:
> From: Scott.Mcgougan@...
>
>
>
> Ooh....Good question!
> Ill have to give that a try tonight. Maybe we can
> get a couple of people to
> run this experiment and we can compile the results.
>
> Fystro of Solusek Ro
>
>
>
>

> more damage?
>
> Azboklin the enchanter
